modName: A truly beautiful character - Imperial Female
summary: I find it really important to play with a good-looking character in my games, if character creation is possible. I stumbled upon a certain Imperial female that looks stunningly pretty to me (at least to me), and I thought I would share with you all.
descriptionHtml:
NO SCRIPT NO NOTHING!! JUST A SAVE FILE.


SAVE GAME
- Game starts at the point you have just entered Helgen Keep, and just have the bounds cut off.
- Girl is given an exotic name Mirelle Ronovski (not sure if you could change name though)


INSTALLATION
1. Unzip file
2. For Win Vista/7/8 users, put the .ess save file into C:/Users/[User name]/Documents/My Game/Skyrim/Saves
3. The game will find it. Should be Save 2004.


REQUIREMENT
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachi SkyHair[/url] is required (Without which the savefile can be loaded but the girl will be bald).
- That\'s it. No DLC required. Everything else is VANILLA. 


ONE MINOR CAVEAT though...
Photos are from another save file that is too mod-ridden to be transferred for your enjoyment. Current downloaded file is a 98% similar character, to the best of my effort and my memory...


Also see my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32229]Realistic Humanoid Movement Speed[/url]



Hope you all enjoy it.
author: brump
